article_title: Why Medical Identity Theft Is Rising And How To Protect Yourself

article_metadata.description: Ninety-one percent of health organizations have had a data breach in the last two years, and for the first time, cyber attacks was the top cause, according to a recent report.
article_metadata.author: Laura Shin
